imdb.title: Ghost Hound
imdb.plot: The experiences of three boys who have had traumatic experiences in childhood from which they have learned to transfer their souls to a parallel world known as the "Unseen World".

episodes.title: Meiseki yume
episodes.plot:

episodes.title: Gankyu-undo-niyoru dakkan saku to sai shori
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Episode #1.7
episodes.plot: Tarou has an accident and ends up in the hospital. Masayuki visits him there and the two boys meet with Dr. Atsushi and Dr. Reika.

episodes.title: Episode #1.8
episodes.plot: Dr. Atsushi reviews what he has discovered in his two months as Tarou's counselor. Tarou has another out-of-body experience which reveals many clues to him. Dr. Atsushi believes that Tarou's experiences are a psychological result of the trauma he had suffered. Makoto is still trying to find more information about his late father and visits the Komagusu.

episodes.title: Episode #1.9
episodes.plot: A dark ghost appears near the place where Tarou's kidnapper was killed. More and more people are beginning to take notice of the strange events that are happening. Tarou and Masayuki hope that these events will help them in uncovering the true identity of who kidnapped Tarou.

episodes.title: Episode #1.10
episodes.plot: Masayuki has become the target of bullies, until Makoto steps in. Tarou discusses a new type of therapy in his session with Dr. Atsushi. Later, Tarou and Masayuki visit the shrine, to see if there they can find out more about the Unseen World.

episodes.title: Episode #1.11
episodes.plot: Tarou's experiences have become so common, that he no longer is disturbed by them until he sees a body floating near the dam. The boys accompany Tarou in checking it out. It seems that there may be a connection there with the events that took place in the abandoned hospital.

episodes.title: Episode #1.12
episodes.plot: The boys experience an ordinary day at school, even though Makoto can't stop thinking about his mother. Tarou meets with Dr. Atsushi, where they talk about homeostasis and the struggle for balance. After his session, Tarou runs into Miyako and the two talk about their experiences until Miyako goes into a trance.

episodes.title: Episode #1.13
episodes.plot: As he sleeps, Tarou has another experience, where this time he goes into the past and visits Kameiwa hospital. While there, he meets a stranger named Snark. Afterwards, the three boys go to the shrine to visit Miyako.

episodes.title: Episode #1.14
episodes.plot: Before school, Makoto's grandmother tries to tell him something important, but he is not interested. At school, the boys ruminate over what Miyako meant about being possessed. They are not the only ones who are discussing Miyako, Dr. Atsushi and Dr. Reika have also taken an interest in her and cut Tarou's counseling session short to meet with her.

episodes.title: Episode #1.15
episodes.plot: Tarou takes a bus to Kumada to apologize to Kei. Makoto is also traveling that way and the two discuss their suspicions about Miyako. Masayuki and Michio find a photographer sneaking around near the Oogami temple and try to get more information.

episodes.title: Episode #1.16
episodes.plot: Tarou accompanies Makoto to confront his mother. Masayuki and Michio try to find more information on DBI and its research when Masayuki has another experience and visits the research center.

episodes.title: Episode #1.17
episodes.plot: Michio is now able to cross into the Unseen World. Makoto is still in Kumada. Takahito, concerned for Miyako, delved into the concept of the Lord of One Word. Tarou begins to suspect that Miyako may be the reincarnation of his dead sister.

episodes.title: Episode #1.18
episodes.plot: Tarou reflects upon what he said to Miyako. Makoto remains in Kumada, thinking about his mother. The investigation into the DBI continues with Suzuki reporting some new findings to the Chief. It seems there may be some connection between the DBI and a rash of kidnappings 11 years earlier.

episodes.title: Episode #1.19
episodes.plot: Makoto rescues his mother when the house is destroyed by a fire. She is taken to the hospital, but does not seem to be quite herself. Meanwhile, Takahito has a fall and also taken to the hospital where he lays in a coma. Even though these incidents seem unrelated, they are a strange coincidence.

episodes.title: Episode #1.20
episodes.plot: Dr. Reika and Dr. Atsushi discuss his MRI scan and discuss the possibility of Lewy Body Dementia. Suzuki begins to investigate both Reika and Makoto's mother. When Miyako is chose to lead the Oogami group, Tarou crosses into the Unseen World to find Takahito.

episodes.title: Episode #1.21
episodes.plot: Takahito finally wakes from his coma, but may be unable to help Miyako. Makoto stays with Tarou's family and learns that their fathers were close friends. Tarou, Makoto, Masayuki, Suzuki, Reika and Dr. Atsushi meet to discuss the growing influence of the Oogami group.

episodes.title: Episode #1.22
episodes.plot: The town prepares for a typhoon and the possible destruction it may cause. Tarou, Masayuki, Makoto, and Michio seem to be the only ones capable of rescuing Miyako from what the Oogami group has planned.
